name: City Builder China
description:
Let's make Chinese architecture.
Let 's build a Chinese city under the Forbidden City.
Let's build a high-rise building in China.
Let's make a modern city from agricultural city.
If the junk line comes, let's sell the grain.
A real estate buyer boarded the junk ship.
When a junk ship arrives, the real estate transaction is concluded.

China City, City Development, City Management, Forbidden City, Beijing, China Games,
